-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ CMetSp ↔ c1 ∈ CMetSp))
⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))=((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)))
⊣ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))

comment: Property deduction for a complete metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
